00076 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00077   if (argc < 2 || argc > 4) {
00078     std::cerr << "Invalid argument list:"
00079              <<"\n Usage: "<<argv[0]<<" configFile [-sim [steps]]"
00080              << std::endl;
00081     return -1;
00082   }
00083   char *configFile = argv[1];
00084   std::auto_ptr<Clock> clk;
00085     
00086   if( argc>=3 ) {
00087     Symbol simOption = argv[2];
00088     if( simOption=="-sim" ) {
00089       size_t stepsPerTick = 60;
00090       
00091       if( argc==4 )
00092        stepsPerTick = string_cast<size_t>(argv[3]);
00093       clk.reset(new StepClock(0, stepsPerTick));
00094     } else {
00095       std::cerr<<"Invalid 2nd argument "<<simOption.str()
00096               <<"\nUsage: "<<argv[0]<<" configFile [-sim [steps]]"
00097               <<std::endl;
00098       return -1;
00099     }
00100   }
00101   Agent agent(configFile, clk.release());
00102   agent.setClock(new RealTimeClock(1.0));
00103   agent.run();
00104   return 0;
00105 }
